title: 3.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Write a program to convert each element of a list into its square.
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
Expected output: [1, 4, 9, 16, 25, 36, 49]
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
